short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display an overlay with the main navigational keys for screen recording.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever I create screen recordings to demo new UI components or interfaces, I always need to separately document what keypresses should be available for keyboard-only control (predominantly for a11y) so I quickly knocked this together in a couple of hours.

This will overlay the main keyboard navigation keys on a web page, and highlight them with animations when they're pressed on your physical keyboard.
